Name: Lofi Furries
About the game: Lofi Furries is an adult-only jigsaw with sexy furries and a relaxing lofi soundtrack. 6 different jigsaws with sexy furries. 6 difficulty levels (number of pieces). 35+ relaxing lofi soundtracks (by Lukrembo).
